mapper.select:
select j.jobId,j.jobTitle,j.releasePrice,j.jobNum,j.jobSource,(j.jobNum-j.signUpNum) as surplusNum,t.typeName,i.userId,i.headimgurl from job j inner join job_job_type jt on j.jobId=jt.jobId inner join job_type t on jt.typeId=t.typeId inner join user_info i on j.userId=i.userId
j.auditStatus=3 and j.jobStatus=1
and jt.typeId=#{typeId}
and ( j.jobSource like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or j.jobTitle like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') )
order by j.releaseTime desc

select i.userId,i.headimgurl,i.UID,j.jobSource,t.typeName,j.submissionTime,j.releasePrice,j.introduce,j.jobTitle,j.jobId, (j.jobNum-j.signUpNum) as surplusNum,ifnull(uj.status,0) as status from job j inner join user_info i on j.userId=i.userId inner join job_job_type jt on j.jobId=jt.jobId inner join job_type t on jt.typeId=t.typeId left join user_job uj on uj.jobId=j.jobId and uj.userId=#{userId} where j.jobId=#{jobId}

select count(1) from user_job
userId=#{userId} and jobId=#{jobId} and status=3
and date(commitTime) = curdate()
mapper.update: update job set jobNum=jobNum-1, signUpNum=signUpNum+1 where jobId=#{jobId}
update job set commitNum=commitNum+1, signUpNum=signUpNum-1 where jobId=#{jobId}
update user_job set status=2, commitTime=now() where userId=#{userId} and jobId=#{jobId}
mapper.select: select taskId from user_job where userId=#{userId} and jobId=#{jobId}
select count(1) from user_job where status=4 and userId=#{userId} and jobId=#{jobId}
